Northlanders struggle to find apples due to ‘lull’ in the domestic market as season ends https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northlanders-struggle-to-find-apples-due-to-lull-in-the-domestic-market-as-season-ends/ED7MCI4L4VCOPGBIDO46HLJ26Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northlanders-struggle-to-find-apples-due-to-lull-in-the-domestic-market-as-season-ends/ED7MCI4L4VCOPGBIDO46HLJ26Y/ Jenny LingCan't find any apples at your local shop? Entries pouring in for Hawke’s Bay Today Harvey Norman Hastings Canon NZ summer photo competition https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/entries-pouring-in-for-hawkes-bay-today-harvey-norman-hastings-canon-nz-summer-photo-competition/ K3BXXGLIDBDGHBAOV5KTHSEQFI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/entries-pouring-in-for-hawkes-bay-today-harvey-norman-hastings-canon-nz-summer-photo-competition/ K3BXXGLIDBDGHBAOV5KTHSEQFI/ Get your camera out and see if you can snap the winning photo. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 23:27:29 +0000 Zachary Meyers, is a 14-year-old amateur photographer. He was on holiday recently at Waimārama. “There was a short power outage which meant I could get some cool Milkyway photos without the light pollution!”
